name: Snowblower-rev-counter
body:
# Snowblower Tachometer

Welcome to the snowblower-rev-counter wiki!

In this project we want to design and build a tachometer (revolution counter) for an very old snowblower.

The goal of this project is not to build something useful, it is rather to let my 15 years son acquire some knowledge in the following fields:

* Basic analog and digital electronic design
* Arduino programming
* 3D design and printing
* Planning and working on a project from the beginning to the end
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
